import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import Rating from '../components/Rating.js'; import products from '../products.js'; const ProductScreen = ({ match }) => { const product = products.find((p) => p._id === match.params.id); return ( <> {' '} Home Page

{product.name}

 price : ${product.price} Description : {product.description} price: ${product.price} status: {product.countInStock > 1 ? 'In stock' : 'out of stock'} status: {product.countInStock > 1 ? 'In stock' : 'out of stock'} ); }; export default ProductScreen;
